message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. I think this is a great price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. Can we meet in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still a bit higher than that. Would you consider $13500? This price reflects the unique value of this product and still gives you a good deal.
Alice, I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $12800 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $13000 for the product. Can we agree on that?
